member.name: F:RESTar.Internal.RESTarResourceType.ScStatic

member.name: F:RESTar.Internal.RESTarResourceType.ScDynamic

member.name: F:RESTar.Internal.RESTarResourceType.Virtual
member.summary: Created by user, non-persistent - no public fields

member.name: F:RESTar.Internal.RESTarResourceType.Dynamic
member.summary: Created by RESTar, DynamicResource 01-64. Persistent resources.
